title: Teacher Professional Development Using Digital Technology: Numeracy Improvement Strategies Linked to Mathematics Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching secondary mathematics and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Provides microlearning content accessible via mobile devices in BYOD environments, conducted as part of corporate teacher competency enhancement programs.

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define and explain 21st-century numeracy concepts
Learners can apply four or more instructional strategies that integrate numeracy across subjects beyond mathematics
Learners can implement a collaborative planning process with peer teachers using digital video resources
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
